items.name: PERFORMANCE ART SUBMISSIONS 2017
items.description:
**THIS CATEGORY IS FOR PERFORMANCE ART (dance, theatre, comedy, etc.) IF YOU'RE A MUSICIAN (even if you incorporate performance art in your set), PLEASE USE THIS CATEGORY: http://bit.ly/1RWGwWO**

Please note that if accepted, the information you submit here may be used on Treefort Music Fest's website and various marketing materials.

items.name: FILMFORT SUBMISSIONS 2017
items.description:
HEY THERE, FILMMAKERS! 

Filmfort seeks films that open the hearts and minds of local residents and those visiting Boise during Treefort Music Fest. We program movies we love, movies with universal themes that make the local global and the global local, movies that inspire, unite and celebrate. Here are a handful of films from past programs to give you a taste of what we're into:

  • THE 4TH
  • IN TRANSIT
  • THE SANDWICH NAZI
  • HOW TO PLAN AN ORGY IN A SMALL TOWN
  • HAVANA MOTOR CLUB
  • GOD BLESS THE CHILD
  • FURSONAS
  • ALMOST HOLY (CROCODILE GENNADIY)
  • JANIS: LITTLE GIRL BLUE
  • 12 O'CLOCK BOYS
  • BENDING STEEL
  • BUFFALO JUGGALOS
  • DAMNATION
  • THE DISGUSTINGS
  • DOOMSDAYS
  • FUNNY BUNNY
  • JOY KEVIN
  • SLACKJAW
  • TOMORROW WE DISAPPEAR
  • WORLD OF TOMORROW

SUBMISSION CRITERIA

To be considered for our 2017 program, films must not have been screened in the Boise area (Ada County) prior to Filmfort.

ELIGIBLE

  • Theatrical - Limited commercial exhibition only outside of the US and on/after January 1, 2016
  • TV - Limited broadcast available only outside the US and on/after January 1, 2017
  • Festival - Exhibition held outside the Boise Region as part of a film festival and on/after January 1, 2016
  • DVD - Limited distribution only outside the US and on/after January 1, 2016
  • Digital - Limited internet broadcast available only outside of the US and on/after January 1, 2016

INELIGIBLE

  • ANY public screening, broadcast, distribution or exhibition before January 1, 2016 (exceptions: Private, invite only screenings, i.e. screenings for family or cast or screenings for feedback, OR screenings for students/faculty in an in-house and in-person-only film festival)
  • Theatrical - Any commercial exhibition in the US
  • TV - Any broadcast available to US audiences
  • Festival - Any exhibition held IN the Boise Region as part of a film festival
  • DVD - Any commercial distribution in the US
  • Digital - Any digital broadcast available to US audiences (including via a non-password protected website, whether commercial or personal, e.g. Vimeo, YouTube, etc.)


SUBMISSION FORMAT

Filmfort requires that all films be submitted via a password-protected, streaming URL link. Links must remain active and accessible through March 31, 2017. No discs.


EXHIBITION FORMAT*

Blu-Ray (preferred), DCP

*NTSC discs only. PAL discs will not be accepted.


SHIPPING + EXHIBITION DETAILS

If selected to screen during the festival, the cost of shipping is the responsibility of the entrant. C.O.D.'s will be refused. The festival cannot accept responsibility for damage or loss of materials while in transit.

Please note that if accepted, the information you submit here may be used on Treefort Music Fest's website and various marketing materials.

items.name: MAKERS - GENERAL STORE (2017)
items.description:
Items submitted by Makers are to be sold on a consignment basis in the General Store area at the Treefort Mainstage 2017.  All Submissions will be reviewed by Treefort staff, and all makers will be notified by 1/31/2017 as to the status of their submission.  

Please note that if accepted, the information you submit here may be used on Treefort Music Fest's website, at the festival and various marketing materials.

items.name: MUSIC SUBMISSIONS 2017
items.description:
Please note that if accepted, the information you submit here may be used on Treefort Music Fest's website and various marketing materials. Submissions for Treefort 2017 close on December 18th, 2016.

All accepted artists will be offered at least one 30-40min set at an official Treefort venue over the 5 day span of the festival (March 22nd - 26th 2017). All accepted artists will receive a minimum of $50 cash (additional travel reimbursement negotiable), 5-day festival wristbands for each band member ($185 value per wristband), access to Treefort Artist Hospitality Lounge, 3 guest list spots to the specific show that you play, eternal glory, plus other Treefort good times and perks (like drink tickets, bag of goodies and more).

RADIUS CLAUSE: All Artists confirmed for Treefort Music Fest will be asked to not play any other Boise area (100 mile radius) shows in March 2017 and to not announce any other Boise area shows in April 2017 and beyond until after their set at the festival. We are open to exceptions to this request, but ask that they are discussed with us before confirming your appearance.

items.name: YOGAFORT 2017 PERFORMER SUBMISSIONS
items.description:
Please note that if accepted, the information you submit here may be used on Treefort Music Fest's website and various marketing materials. Submissions for Yogafort 2017 close on December 18th, 2016.

All accepted artists will be offered at least one 45-90 min set at an official Treefort venue over the 5 day span of the festival (March 22nd - 26th 2017). All accepted talent will receive a 5-day festival wristbands for each teacher or band member ($185 value per wristband), access to Treefort Artist Hospitality Lounge, 3 guest list spots to the specific show that you play, eternal glory, plus other Treefort and Yogafort good times and perks (like drink tickets, bag of goodies and more).

RADIUS CLAUSE: All Talent confirmed for Yogafort will be asked to not teach or perform at any other Boise area (100 mile radius) studios or venues in March 2017 and to not announce any other Boise area events in April 2017 and beyond until after their set at the festival. We are open to exceptions to this request, but ask that they are discussed with us before confirming your appearance.

items.description:

All teachers will be offered at least one 1 hour to 1.5 hours set as an official Treefort venue over the 3 day span Yogafort (March 25th - 27th, 2016). All teachers will receive a minimum of a 5-day festival wristband ($119+ value per wristband), access to Treefort Artist Hospitality Lounge on day of performance, 3 guest list spots to the class you teach, eternal glory, plus other Treefort good times and perks (like drink tickets, bag of goodies and more).

items.name: Perkins Coie Pre-Consultation Survey
items.description: Notable law firm Perkins Coie will be offering office hours free of charge. The attorneys will be on hand to meet with you at Hackfort to discuss any legal concerns you have about your startup. Interested? Of course you are! Click below to register for office hours at Hackfort - and get one-on-one time with some exceptional attorneys. Availability is limited.  Limit one office hours slot per startup. Any questions, please email hackfortquestions@treefortmusicfest.com.

items.name: STORYFORT  SUBMISSIONS 2016
items.description:
The information you submit here may be used on Treefort Music Fest's website and various marketing materials.

We are looking for writers of fiction, poetry, and storytellers of all kinds. We will consider individual authors as well as panel presentations. Please share a short description of the 45 minute presentation you would like to make, a list of your publications, link to your website or other things we should know about you. All applicants will be notified in early February, 2016.

items.name: HACKFORT 2015
items.description:
Boise is booming and we are looking for talented developers to connect with our community at Hackfort 2! We will be awarding subsidized trips to the top applicants which will cover the cost of accommodations, food and wristbands to Hackfort and Treefort.

Please fill out this application and submit your resume by JANUARY 31, 2015.

We will finalize the list of winners by mid February and be in touch with the next steps. 
Questions? Email us at "hackfortquestions@treefortmusicfest.com".

items.name: FILM SUBMISSIONS
items.description:
SUBMISSION FORMAT 
PRIVATE VIMEO LINKS ONLY. No discs.

EXHIBITION FORMAT* 

Blu-Ray (preferred), DCP
*NTSC discs only. PAL discs will not be accepted.

SHIPPING + EXHIBITION DETAILS

If selected to screen during the festival, the cost of shipping is the responsibility of the entrant. C.O.D.'S will be refused. The festival cannot accept responsibility for damage or loss of materials while in transit. 

"WHAT KINDS OF FILMS ARE YOU LOOKING FOR?"

We are drawn to human stories. Whether docs or narratives, we tend to program films that delve into the human spirit. For reference, here are a few films that played at TFF2014: DOOMSDAYS, SLOMO, QASIM, PINE RIDGE, YEARBOOK, DAMNATION, THIS IS JAY CALVIN, A SHORT FILM ABOUT SAFEKEEPING, RICH HILL, and BENDING STEEL.

Please note that if accepted, the information you submit here may be used on Treefort Music Fest's website and various marketing materials.

items.name: Register for the Hackathon • #hackfort2
items.description:
HACKFORT NEEDS HACKING!

• START DATE: March 1, 2015
• END DATE: March 28, 2015

We challenge you and fellow attendees to come collaborate or hack-solo in the creation of a unique app or website to benefit the City of Boise. All hackers must first purchase a Hackfort ticket and then fill out this registration form to participate. Details and guidelines will posted March 1 on treefortmusicfest.com/hackfort, at which time the official hacking begins.
